text: Thomas Allen Brown (May 24, 1937 - April 4, 2020), known also as Timothy Brown and Timmy Brown, was an American singer, professional American football player, and actor. He was born in Richmond, Indiana. He played Capt. Spearchucker Jones in M*A*S*H. As a football player, he played for the Green Bay Packers, Philadelphia Eagles, and Baltimore Colts. Brown died on April 4, 2020 in Palm Springs, California of dementia-related problems at the age of 82.1960s Eagles great Timmy Brown dies at 82 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:American football running backs Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Actors from Indiana Category:Sportspeople from Indiana Category:Singers from Indiana Category:People from Richmond, Indiana
title: Timothy Brown (actor)
